title: Minecraft
about: An open-world sandbox game where players can explore, interact with, and modify a procedurally generated map made of blocky 3D objects. Gameplay involves building, resource gathering, crafting, and combat.

keyFeatures.title: Survival and Creative Modes
keyFeatures.description: Choose between resource management with monsters or unlimited creative building.

keyFeatures.title: Infinite Worlds
keyFeatures.description: Explore procedurally generated terrain, biomes, and secrets.

keyFeatures.title: Multiplayer Fun
keyFeatures.description: Join realms and servers to play and build with friends globally.

systemSpecs.Processor: Intel Core i3-3210 / AMD A8-7600 APU or equivalent
systemSpecs.Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 / AMD Radeon R5 series (with OpenGL 4.4)
